    • Method Detail

      • installGame

        public static boolean installGame()
        Installs the game. Installation locations: Mac: ~/Library/Application Support/textfighter Windows: C:\\ProgramFiles\textfighter Linux: /opt/textfighter Other operating systems are not supported.
        Returns:
        True if successful, false if not.

      • loadMethod

        public static java.lang.Object loadMethod​(java.lang.Class type,
                                          org.json.simple.JSONObject obj,
                                          java.lang.Class parentType)
        Loads a singular method.

        Useful for loading a Method that is an argument that you wouldnt/cant pass a JSONArray to

        Parameters:
        type - The type of the method.
        obj - The JSONObject that the method is located in.
        parentType - The class of the parent of the method.
        Returns:
        The new method that was loaded.

      • loadMethods

        public static java.util.ArrayList loadMethods​(java.lang.Class type,
                                              org.json.simple.JSONArray methodArray,
                                              java.lang.Class parentType)
        Loads a JSONArray of methods

        Loads the methods in things like requirements, choicemethods, and others Used if you have a JSONArray full of methods (And only methods) to parse

        Parameters:
        type - The type of methods that are being loaded (ChoiceMethod, Requirement, etc.).
        methodArray - The JSONArray that the methods are located in.
        parentType - The class of the parent of the methods.
        Returns:
        An ArrayList of the type of methods loaded.

      • getPackDirectory

        public static java.io.File getPackDirectory​(java.lang.String directoryName,
                                            java.io.File parent)
        Returns a directory with the given name in the directory (parent) given.
        Parameters:
        directoryName - The name of the directory to find
        parent - The parent directory
        Returns:
        A directory with the given name in the directory (parent) given. If none found, return null.

        Parameters:

        parent - The parent directory
        Returns:

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • loadInterfaces

        public static boolean loadInterfaces()
        Loads the interfaces.

        First loads from the pack (If one is specified in the config file), then loads from the default pack.

        Returns:
        True if successful, False if unsuccessful

      • loadLocations

        public static boolean loadLocations()
        Loads the locations.

        First loads from the pack (If one is specified in the config file), then loads from the default pack.

        Returns:
        True if successful, false if unsuccessful.

      • loadCustomVariables

        Returns:

      • loadConfig

        public static void loadConfig()
        Loads the configured colors.

        If the config directory does not exist, then a new one is created

      • loadDefaultValues

        public static boolean loadDefaultValues()
        Loads the default values.

        NOTE: This one is different from the rest (Except custom variables): Loads from the default pack or the custom pack NOT BOTH.

        Returns:
        Whether or not successful.

      • loadDeathMethods

        public static boolean loadDeathMethods()
        Loads the death methods (methods that are invoked when the player dies).

        First loads from the pack (If one is specified in the config file), then loads from the default pack.

        Returns:
        Whether or not successful

      • loadLevelUpMethods

        public static boolean loadLevelUpMethods()
        Loads the death methods (methods that are invoked when the player dies).

        First loads from the pack (If one is specified in the config file), then loads from the default pack.

        Returns:
        Whether or not successful

      • loadChoicesOfAllLocations

        public static boolean loadChoicesOfAllLocations()
        Loads the choices of all the locations in the packs.
        Returns:
        Whether or not successful

      • loadGame

        public static boolean loadGame​(java.lang.String saveName)
        Loads a save from the given file name.

        Loads all values from the file and creates a new player instance with those values.

        Parameters:
        saveName - The name of the save file.
        Returns:
        True if successful. False is unsuccessful.

      • newGame

        public static void newGame​(java.lang.String name)
        Creates a new save file.

        Fails if there is already a save with the name given.

        Parameters:
        name - The name of the new save.

      • saveGame

        public static boolean saveGame()
        Saves the game.

        Rewrites the whole file.

        Returns:
        True if successful, False if unsuccessful.

      • addSave

        public static void addSave​(java.lang.String name)
        Adds a save to the saves arraylist.
        Parameters:
        name - The name to be added.

      • removeSave

        public static void removeSave​(java.lang.String name)
        Removes a save file.

        Removes the save from the saves arraylist.

        Parameters:
        name - The name of the save.

      • sortEnemies

        public static void sortEnemies()
        Sorts the enemies by difficulty from lowest to highest and sets enemies.

      • setPossibleEnemies

        public static void setPossibleEnemies()
        Sets the possible enemies arraylist in TextFighter with enemies that meet their requirements for the player to fight.

      • invokePlayerInput

        public static boolean invokePlayerInput()
        Gets and handles player input.
        Returns:
        True if a valid choice. False if not.

      • setUpFight

        public static boolean setUpFight​(java.lang.String en)
        Sets up a fight.
        Parameters:
        en - The name of the enemy to be fought.
        Returns:
        False if invalid enemy, else true.

      • playerWins

        public static void playerWins()
        Moves the player to the "win" location.

      • exitGame

        public static void exitGame​(int code)
        Calls System.exit()
        Parameters:
        code - The exit code.

      • gameLoaded

        public static boolean gameLoaded()
        Determine if a save is loaded.
        Returns:
        True if a game is loaded. False if not.

      • playGame

        public static void playGame()
        Orchestrates player turns.

      • main

        public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
        Detemine if the game is in test mode, load assets, and main game loop. If the game is not already installed, then it will be installed.
        Parameters:
        args - Command line input.

      • doNothing

        public static void doNothing()
        Does literally nothing.
